title: Spotify Desktop Assistant
description: An ESP32 project allowing you to display your current Spotify song information onto a TFT display, using the Spotify API.

title: Custom Macropad
description: Designed a custom 3X3 matrix PCB for a macropad, optimizing layout for efficient keypress registration and durability.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Designed and developed a portfolio website utilizing React.js. Integrated a 3D Model Viewer with camera controls and auto-rotate
